verbs.description: [ARG1: suspect] [V: arrested] [ARG2: in fatal shooting of good samaritan who stopped to help motorist on san diego freeway] a 21-year - old man was arrested saturday in connection with the fatal shooting of a good samaritan who stopped to assist a seemingly stranded motorist on interstate 15 san diego police said sunday brandon acuna was arrested on suspicion of first - degree murder and burglary said san diego police lt anthony dupree he declined to offer any further details except to say that others may have been involved in the shooting curtis adams 21 an good samaritan lt anthony dupree logan heights burglary curtis adams navy kristina davis sduniontribune com i 15 california highway patrol lt anthony dupree brandon acuna i-15 samaritan san diego freeway mt officer
